dc:title: Untitled review of A Catholic Speaks His Mind on America's Religious Conflict
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Lukewarm review of a book on Christian unity. Defends the author's critique of Catholics but wishes he was better versed on ecumenical efforts, including ones she is involved in.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 632 1952-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
